content: I'm glad you like the idea of combining white and wood frames. I've been thinking about the layout of the room, and I realized that the new artwork will be above the coffee table where I set up my laptop to work. Since I've been using the room as a makeshift office, I want to make sure the artwork doesn't distract me from work. Do you have any tips on how to arrange the pieces to minimize distractions while still creating a visually appealing display?
